themes: shift from city to federal funding
key_phrases: Just funding the arts in the way that allowed Women and their Work, Big Medium, and many other artists and arts organizations to thrive as they did in the past
For some strange reason, that has ended
COA forced so many to get federal funding to survive instead of grants from the city
that isn't even an option anymore
Taking away the COA's funding towards the arts and its foundations during 2020-21 has now put the whole ecosystem of the creative sector of Austin in jeopardy
